title: Ryanair shares surge after lifting passenger traffic target
text:
Last week, Ryanair ended talks with Boeing over an order of MAX10 aircraft.

Ryanair's rivals also gained ground, with easyJet UK:EZJ shares rising 4% and Wizz Air Holding UK:WIZZ gaining 3%.

The broader Stoxx Europe 600 XX:SXXP rose 0.7% to 467.05 in midday trade.

Continental XE:CON powertrain spinoff Vitesco Technologies climbed 3% in its trading debut.
